html.p: Data Collection: Use Sophos Central SIEM Integration Add-on for collecting Sophos data.

search.query: `cs_sophos` | head 1 | stats count | eval data=if(count>0, "Data Present", "Data Not Present"), label="`cs_sophos`" | table label, data

`cs_sophos` type IN ("Event::Endpoint::ServiceNotRunning", "Event::Endpoint::ServiceRestored") $tkn_host$ $tkn_dhost$ $tkn_user$ | stats count, latest(_time) as _time, values(src_ip) as src_ip, values(suser) as user by host, dhost, type | eval ServiceDisabled = if(type="Event::Endpoint::ServiceNotRunning", _time, 0), ServiceEnabled = if(type="Event::Endpoint::ServiceRestored", _time, 0) | where ServiceDisabled>ServiceEnabled | eval "Service Disabled Since"=strftime(ServiceDisabled, "%F %T") | table host, dhost, src_ip, user, "Service Disabled Since"

`cs_sophos` type="Event::Endpoint::Sav*" $tkn_host$ $tkn_dhost$ $tkn_user$ | stats count, latest(_time) as _time, values(src_ip) as src_ip, values(suser) as user by host, dhost, type | eval RTPDisabled = if(type="Event::Endpoint::SavDisabled", _time, 0), RTPEnabled = if(type="Event::Endpoint::SavEnabled", _time, 0) | where RTPDisabled>RTPEnabled | eval "RTP Disabled Since"=strftime(RTPDisabled, "%F %T") | table host, dhost, src_ip, user, "RTP Disabled Since"

`cs_sophos` type="Event::Endpoint::Isolation::*" $tkn_host$ $tkn_dhost$ $tkn_user$ | stats count, latest(_time) as _time, values(src_ip) as src_ip, values(suser) as user by host, dhost, type | eval EndpointIsolated = if(type="Event::Endpoint::Isolation::Isolated", _time, 0), EndpointUnIsolated = if(type="Event::Endpoint::Isolation::UnIsolated", _time, 0) | where EndpointIsolated>EndpointUnIsolated | eval "In Isolation Since"=strftime(EndpointIsolated, "%F %T") | table host, dhost, src_ip, user, "In Isolation Since"

`cs_sophos` type="Event::Endpoint::Management::*" $tkn_host$ $tkn_dhost$ $tkn_user$ | stats count, latest(_time) as _time, values(src_ip) as src_ip, values(suser) as user by host, dhost, type | eval EndpointManagementResumed = if(type="Event::Endpoint::Management::Resumed", _time, 0), EndpointManagementSuspended = if(type="Event::Endpoint::Management::Suspended", _time, 0) | where EndpointManagementSuspended>EndpointManagementResumed | eval "Suspended from Management Since"=strftime(EndpointManagementSuspended, "%F %T") | table host, dhost, src_ip, user, "Suspended from Management Since"

`cs_sophos` type="Event::Endpoint::UpdateFailure::*" NOT type IN ("Event::Endpoint::UpdateFailure::UPDATED_SUCCESSFULLY", "Event::Endpoint::UpdateFailure::RESTART_NEEDED", "Event::Endpoint::UpdateFailure::RESTARTING") $tkn_host$ $tkn_dhost$ $tkn_user$ | stats count, latest(_time) as latest_event, values(name) as description, values(src_ip) as src_ip, values(suser) as user by host, dhost, type | eval latest_event=strftime(latest_event, "%F %T") | sort -count | `cs_sophos_update_errors_filter`

`cs_sophos` type="Event::Endpoint::OutOfDate" $tkn_host$ $tkn_dhost$ $tkn_user$ | stats count, latest(_time) as latest_event, values(src_ip) as src_ip, values(suser) as user by host, dhost | eval latest_event=strftime(latest_event, "%F %T") | sort -count | `cs_sophos_endpoint_outofdate_filter`

`cs_sophos` type="Event::Endpoint::Core*RestoreFailed" $tkn_host$ $tkn_dhost$ $tkn_user$ | stats count, latest(_time) as latest_event, values(name) as description, values(src_ip) as src_ip, values(suser) as user by host, dhost, type | eval latest_event=strftime(latest_event, "%F %T") | sort -count | `cs_sophos_core_restore_failed_filter`

`cs_sophos` type="Event::Smc::Renew*" $tkn_host$ $tkn_dhost$ $tkn_user$ | stats count, latest(_time) as latest_event, values(src_ip) as src_ip, values(suser) as user by host, dhost | eval latest_event=strftime(latest_event, "%F %T") | sort -count | `cs_sophos_expiration_messages_filter`

`cs_sophos` type="Event::Endpoint::HmpaExploitPrevented" $tkn_host$ $tkn_dhost$ $tkn_user$ | stats count, latest(_time) as latest_event, values(name) as description, values(src_ip) as src_ip, values(suser) as user by host, dhost | eval latest_event=strftime(latest_event, "%F %T") | sort -count | `cs_sophos_exploit_prevented`

`cs_sophos` type="Event::Endpoint::Application::Blocked" $tkn_host$ $tkn_dhost$ $tkn_user$ | stats count, latest(_time) as latest_event, values(name) as description, values(src_ip) as src_ip, values(suser) as user by host, dhost | eval latest_event=strftime(latest_event, "%F %T") | sort -count
